root.name: 3D ROI stacks
root.description: Toolbox providing the basic functionalities for creating and manipulating 3D regions of interest as Z-stacks of any kind of 2D regions of interest
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 1.1.1.0 Date 2013-10-25 23:21:36
Fixed z coordinates for each slice
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2013-07-19 17:33:05
* Fixed an issue causing ROI selection not to be exclusive * Added a new (improved) painter class to simplify the use of extending classes
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2013-07-18 13:43:49
Fixed an issue causing StackOverflowError when changing some ROI properties (name, color, etc.)
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2013-07-16 11:45:40
fixed classpath again...
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2013-07-16 11:36:45
Fixed class name in the submitted plugin
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2013-07-16 11:13:28
